titles.title: To require the Commissioner of Internal Revenue to report on applications for tax credits under the low-income housing tax credit program that, in the preceding fiscal year, were approved but not allocated.
Missed Opportunities in Low Income Housing Act of 2017
Missed Opportunities in Low Income Housing Act of 2017
Missed Opportunities in Low Income Housing Act of 2017

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
Missed Opportunities in Low Income Housing Act of 2017
This bill requires the Internal Revenue Service to report annually to Congress on applications for tax credits under the low-income housing tax credit program that, in the preceding fiscal year, were approved but not allocated credits.
